name: CALIFORNIA/NEVADA CREDIT UNION LEAGUE
sampleDescriptions: financial services issues affecting credit unions
Opposed fee caps on credit card payments through CPFB rule Opposed changing to terminal fee competition and structure or swipe fees
Discussed issues with the Overseas Military Banking program

Opposed the Credit Card Competition act which is in regard to terminal transaction processing Discussed maintaining non-profit tax-exempt status of Credit Unions Opposed credit union inclusion in Comm
